name: Prestigious Mining
description:
Prestigious Mining: a game about making a lot of coins. Lots and lots of them.

Several unique features are present in this game; some of which you may have seen in one or two idle games, and some not at all. Unlock them and explore the game!

Want to give feedback or criticism on how to improve the game / report a bug you have found? Go to this subreddit and make a post: https://www.reddit.com/r/MingHinCollections/

Enjoying the game? Subscribe to the subreddit above so you don't miss out any updates!
